title: LF Elo boost

replies.body:
LOL THE DOWN VOTES!!! Whats the matter. Dont like the fact I am asking to join in a smurf run.
LOL
LOL

LOL

nah we just hate retards like you who type like "LOL LOL LOL" you sound like a retarded 12 year old Chinese kid that just came to Australia. Youre one of those kids who complains about their team and thinks they deserve more. fuck outta here

how come you were Platinum last season but bronze 5 now?
http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=TankerInc

We would all like an ELO boost, and unless you are good enough, you won't last long at a higher ELO. And by looking at your attitude, you would be a part of the reason you are at a low ELO.

At least when some of us complain about being low and having bad teams, we are genuine about it and really want to make a difference. You are that tard who gets carried, than ruins games all the way down and yells "BUT I WAS DIAMOND!"
